CustomField.formula: AND( Billing_Type__c='ARR', PurchaseDate<=Today(),OR(IsPickval(Status,''),IsPickval(Status,'Active'),IsPickval(Status,'At Risk'),IsPickval(Status,'Inactive'),IsPickval(Status,'Registered'),IsPickval(Status,'Upcoming Renewal'),IsPickval(Status,'Upsold'),IsPickval(Status,'Valid'),IsPickval(Status,'Future'),IsPickval(Status,'Valid & Renewed')),Account.ParentId='', UsageEndDate >=Today(), Asset_success_flag__c <>'Managed Services')
CustomField.label: universe
